item.title: Neural networks — the real basics
item.description: From logistic regression to a neural net Fitting a logistic regression in R Basic Neural network Forward propogation Back propogation Training the network Our neural network Bibliography From logistic regression to a neural net With all the terminology and perhaps unfamiliar looking plots designed to resemble the inner workings of a brain, neural networks may seem confusing. So let’s bypass all the jargon and such for a few minutes.
